price: Ese abahakanyi ntabwo bahembewe ibyo bajyaga bakora?
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
